刷入.definition: to flash; to overwrite the firmware (computing)

刷卡.definition: to use a credit card (or swipe card, smart card etc)

刷單.definition: to generate fake transactions in order to game a commercial online platform (one that rewards users who make numerous transactions)

刷夜.definition: to stay up all night; to pull an all-nighter

刷屏.definition: to flood (on an Internet forum etc)

刷新.definition: to renovate; to refurbish; to refresh (computer window); to write a new page (in history); to break (a record)

刷機.definition: to replace firmware (on a mobile device)

刷臉.definition: to scan one's face (for identity verification)

刷題.definition: to do a lot of practice questions (to prepare for an exam)
